name: siyuan
description: SiYuan is a privacy-friendly, self-hosted note-taking and personal knowledge management app. It offers block-based editing, graph views, and sync across devices via desktop and web clients.
features: Block-based editing: Treats every paragraph, heading, and element as a referenceable block.
Bidirectional links: Creates connections between notes with automatic backlink tracking.
Graph visualization: Displays note relationships in interactive knowledge graphs.
Multi-device sync: Synchronizes notes across desktop and mobile devices via cloud or WebDAV.
Version history: Tracks changes with snapshots and allows rollback to previous versions.
Template system: Creates reusable templates for consistent note structure.
Database views: Queries and displays note data in tables, lists, and galleries.
Flashcards: Generates spaced repetition flashcards from note content for learning.
Plugin marketplace: Extends functionality with community plugins and themes.
Export options: Exports notes as Markdown, PDF, HTML, or Word documents.
Local-first: Stores all data locally with optional cloud sync for privacy.
AI integration: Connects to AI services for content generation and assistance.
